original_text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets, and laid them on beds and couches, that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them.
korean_text: 심지어 병든 사람을 메고 거리에 나가 침대와 요 위에 누이고 베드로가 지날 때에 혹 그의 그림자라도 누구에게 덮일까 바라고

sentences.original_text: They brought forth the sick into the streets
and laid them on beds and couches
that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by

sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 몇 사람을 덮기를 바랐습니다
